titleStmt.title: Admirable snuff, of great use in most distempers of the head; and cure for the French disease, or any of its various symptoms, as running of the reins, or matter issuing from the privy parts, heat or scalding of urine, pricking pains in making water, &c. which if neglected, ...
titleStmt.author: Langham, William.

notesStmt.note: Title taken from first lines of text.
